## How to test?
- [ ] docker compose up --build
- [ ] Open http://localhost:3000
- [ ] API docs: http://localhost:8000/docs
- [ ] (Optional) pytest (backend)

## Checklist
- [ ] Changes are small and incremental (commit history is clean)
- [ ] No secrets committed (.env is not committed)
- [ ] Code follows the layered architecture (API/Service/Repository)
